name: Dimension Jumper (Game Development Tutorials)
description:
Made in 4 days for the Geo Jam. Theme "The Other Side"

In this game you play as a stickman who is on a train to nowhere. Your only goal is to survive for 3 minutes (180 seconds). On the way you will encounter enemies and rocks, so avoid these, you have to either shoot or jump into a different dimension. Good Luck.

Controls - In game

Instruction - In game
